titleStmt.title: Affectuum decidua, or, Due expressions in honour of the truly noble Charles Capell, Esq. (sonne to the Right Honourable Arthur Ld. Capell, Baron of Hadham) deceased on Christmas Day, 1656
titleStmt.author: Turner, Francis, 1638?-1700.

notesStmt.note: Poems on the death of Charles Capel by Francis Turner and ten others (mostly New College men).
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
